item.title: Formal Notice sent to Keith Edelman, Principal Assistant Chief, FCPA Unit, Fraud Section, DOJ
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2050_0800_email_to_doj_keith_edelman_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code ยง 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 05, 2024, 20:50 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 05, 2024, 07:50 -0500 (Eastern Standard Time) To: Keith Edelman (Principal Assistant Chief, FCPA Unit, Fraud Section, U.S. Department of Justice Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2050_0800_email_to_doj_keith_edelman_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Edelman, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.
